USER_ROLE: UPDATE user_role SET roleName = ?, description = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
USER: UPDATE user SET password = ?, userRoleId = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
ACCOUNT-TYPE: UPDATE account_type SET accountTypeName = ?, description = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
TRANSACTION-TYPE: UPDATE transaction_type SET displayName = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
TENANT: UPDATE tenant SET tenantName = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
BANK: UPDATE bank SET name = ?, externalId = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
ACCOUNT: UPDATE account SET displayName = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
CATEGORY-TYPE: UPDATE category_type SET categoryTypeName = ? WHERE id = ?
CATEGORY: UPDATE category SET categoryTypeId = ?, categoryName = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
SUBCATEGORY: UPDATE subcategory SET subcategoryName = ?, categoryId = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
PAYEE: UPDATE payee SET payeeName = ?, defaultSubCategoryId = ?, lastModifiedById = ? WHERE id = ?
